text: CYL Music Studio features teachers who are true practitioners, actively performing at concerts and events while bringing practical, real-world expertise to every lesson. They go beyond merely reading notes‚Äîteaching music with genuine passion and expressive emotion. Truly exceptional educators.
A great space to hold small events, with nice ambience and clear acoustics. The CYL team was also very helpful, going the extra mile to help with our event set up.

I've been taking saxophone lessons at CYL Music Studio, and it has been an amazing experience! Special thanks to my teachers Joanna and EJ, whose deep knowledge and extensive experience truly stand out. They have a remarkable ability to break down complex concepts into simple, manageable steps, making it much easier to improve my playing. Their guidance has been instrumental in helping me achieve my goals.

What sets CYL Music Studio apart is its commitment to fostering a vibrant musical community. Beyond individual lessons, the studio offers events, workshops, and additional classes that expose students to various aspects of music. This holistic approach has broadened my perspective and deepened my appreciation for music as a whole.

I have been with CYL since its days at Burn Road, & now at Waterloo. I highly recommend CYL Music Studio to anyone looking to grow musically, whether you're a beginner or an experienced player. The supportive environment and talented teachers make it a fantastic place to learn and explore

Awesome, clean, spacious and conducive environment for rehearsals. Admin staffs and boss are always very nice and understanding towards customers needs. We, as consumers, really appreciate their service in whole!

10/10 recommend! :)
Had a great experience rehearsing at CYL. Love the ambience, the well-maintained equipment and the central location! Keep up the great work CYL! üëç
